coinage.translation[0].definitions[0].de: the system or type of money used in a country
coinage.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: the gold coinage of the Roman empire
coinage.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a word or phrase that has been recently invented
coinage.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: The phrase ‘glass ceiling’ is a fairly recent coinage.
coinage.translation[0].definitions[2].de: the invention of new words or phrases
coinage.translation[1].definitions[0].de: the system of coins used in a country
coinage.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: Britain did not use decimal coinage until 1971.
coinage.translation[1].definitions[1].de: money in the form of coins
coinage.translation[1].definitions[1].ex: substantial amounts of silver and gold coinage
